tittleMetaTag: Pokecircuit | Pokémon Competitive Tournaments & VGC Teams
descripcionMetaTag: Pokecircuit is a Pokémon competitive platform for VGC teams, tournaments, standings, and downloadable top results. TCG tournaments supported.

home.title: Register your Pokémon Teams or Pokémon individually.
home.subtitle: Create and organize your teams to be ready for competition.
